sensor.negr1: Have been using for about 2 months now. Good call quality. quality.posr1: Its a good phone.As far as design is concern the phone is sleek.Since its a Sony phone the sound quality & camera quality is good enough.The only demerit I found is that due to low memory it hangs sometime and give late response if more applications are in running state.More over the internet/data traffic gets automatically disconnected if the phone is left idle for some time.
